title: 怎么设置op可以无限圈地

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
/res改为/resadmin即可 无需设置.
 如:/resadmin create 创建的领地不受大小限制
 /resadmin set 可直接设置当前领地权限

replies.author: Xx123c
replies.txt_content: OP输入/resadmin create 领地名 即可~

replies.author: haojie2052
replies.txt_content: /resadmin create 领地名 腐竹就可以无限圈地了
